sense.def: Alternative Names yan gan 眼疳 , ocular gan -illness.

Pathological Condition of gan 疳 , gan- illness, together with itching eyes that are red, fester and develop ulcers, or sometimes grow a shade, with harm inflicted to the eyes. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 89: 治小兒雀目及疳眼，宜服煮肝石決明散方 , “To cure sparrow eye and gan -illness eye in children, the recipe to ingest the powder with cooked liver and shi jue ming is advisable”. Gan yue 乾啘 , dry retching [2]

Illness Sign identical with yue 啘 , retching. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ban xia 半夏 quoting Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 傷寒病啘 , “Harm caused by cold disease, retching”. writes: 傷寒乾啘 , “Harm caused by cold, dry retching ”. Gan yu 肝鬱 , pent-up liver [qi] [1]

Etiological Agent. of mental blockage with liver qi accumulation. Dan xi shou jing Book on clinical medicine. Early 丹溪手鏡 Ming era. Mj: 怒氣大逆，肝鬱 木盛 , “Anger makes qi massively rise contrary to its regular direction; there is pent-up liver [qi] and an abundance of wood [qi]”.
